::Battera::

She walked away from the bridge and wandered down the halls.  She was 
thinking about the transmission she got from that mysterious bot.  
She was now curious about who this Unicron was.  She had questions, 
but no one to answer them.  She walked along, without noticing where 
she was going.  She was really walking around the deck in circles.  
She past the bridge twice and was about to pass it again.  She wanted 
to know more about this Unicron. Where did he come from? What did he 
want? why was he even here? Could he be persuaded to talk about 
peace? Was peace still a possablility?  She had lots of questions, 
and no answers.  She just kept walking and thinking.
